participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: A free-spirited individual who enjoys pushing boundaries and exploring new ideas. He is passionate about swimming and programming.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, Sophie enjoys spending time with friends and engaging in casual conversations. She has a laid-back approach to life.
participant_2.background: i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

content.text: Hello there. I'm fine and I work from home. Do you have a job?
I am a teacher, but my mom is a retired nurse .
Well that's boring. i like to spend my money on cars in videogames. Do you play videogames?
I am not into it. But my mom says that. What is your favorite genre ?
female, and what is your favorite genre?
I am a programmer and love it .
i've never had a steady relationship. Have you ever been in love?
I have not tried it since a long time, but it is okay .
i watch too much tv in spare time. tv is a commercial box.
That is cool. I am a programmer, but my parents are a very social worker .
i go to the gym most days just to socialize and i have never seen your parents there
I am not that close. You should get one .
